definition: mind/state of mind/attention/(Chinese medicine) psychic constitution
see 心不在焉[xin1 bu4 zai4 yan1]
to concentrate one's attention/to be fully focused

sentences.english: Mother will be expecting me, and getting uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 母亲一定会盼望盼得心神不安。

sentences.english: There, awaiting my uneasy embrace, are some five or six skateboards .
sentences.chinese: 那里，五六块轮滑板，正等候我心神不安的拥抱。

sentences.english: Live in Northern California once, but leave before it makes you soft.
sentences.chinese: 去北加州住一阵子，但在心神松懒前搬走。

sentences.english: Her constant shuffling of newspapers disconcerted us.
sentences.chinese: 她不断地乱翻报纸使我们心神不定。

sentences.english: As told me recover spirit, waiting for a long time the rain in July.
sentences.chinese: 好像在告诫我恢复心神，去守候七月一场久违的雨景。

sentences.english: It analyses the development of emotions relates to five organs and mind.
sentences.chinese: 还分析了情志的产生与五脏和心神有关。

sentences.english: I was disturbed about the bad news.
sentences.chinese: 对于这坏消息，我感到心神不安。

sentences.english: I noticed that my mind was all over the place.
sentences.chinese: 我发现自己的心神七零八落，到处都是。

sentences.english: The aside-minded student consents to the sentence in the presence of me.
sentences.chinese: 心神不定的学生在我眼前制定这份判决。

sentences.english: Practicing Quan is to calm your mind.
sentences.chinese: 太极拳更重视修身养性，心神安静。

sentences.english: The abaissement always has a restrictive influence on the personality as whole.
sentences.chinese: 心神丧失对于人格整体总是会有限制性的影响。

sentences.english: They look into the beauty of thy mind.
sentences.chinese: 触向你心神之纵深处张望。

sentences.english: Avoid loud and aggressive persons, they are vexatious to the spirit.
sentences.chinese: 避开喧闹寻衅者，他们会扰人心神。

sentences.english: I always get the collywobbles before an interview.
sentences.chinese: 我在面谈前总心神不宁。

sentences.english: As a single guy, you are feeling uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 作为单身男子，你正感到心神不定。

sentences.english: Feeling lost, I wandered into the living room.
sentences.chinese: 我感到失落，心神恍惚地走进起居室。

definition: to give attention to sth/please give (some of your valuable) attention to my task/to be distracted
Lingtai county in Pingliang 平涼|平凉[Ping2 liang2], Gansu
